chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s1 (app c tl)

Premises:
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
preDTA = Map state : Set
union_mpl = fix union_mpl (s0 s1 : state) {struct s0} : state := match s0 with | @M0 _ => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 prec_list s10 s11 end | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => match s1 with | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_mpl_0 c1 pl1 s0 | _ => union_mpl_0 c0 pl0 s1 end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M2 prec_list s00 s01 | @M1 _ c1 pl1 => union_m
state = Map prec_list : Set
List.tl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
ad = N : Set
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty
union_str_def = fun s0 : state => forall (s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s1 (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_sd : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) /\ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl)
union_std_def = fun s0 : state => forall (s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) /\ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_s0d_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (app 1%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 1%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 1%N tl)
union_s0d_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (app 0%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 0%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 0%N tl)
union_s_rpl : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
union_s_rpl_def = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_s0d : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) s -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl s) (app c tl)
union_s0d_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M0 prec_list) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M0 prec_list)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s1d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s_prd0 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) s -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_s1d : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl)
union_s1d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> a <> c -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c0 : ad) (pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) -> c <> c0 -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c0 pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s_prd1 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
umpl_conv_1_inj : forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_1 s0 = umpl_conv_1 s1 -> s0 = s1
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
union_mpl_0 = fix union_mpl_0 (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M1 prec_list c pl | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => if (c =? c0)%N then M1 prec_list c (union_pl pl pl0) else MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match c with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s0) s1 | N.pos (p'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s1) | N.pos (p'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s0) s...

```coq
intros s0 s1 d c tl Hcompat Hreconnait.
destruct Hreconnait as [Hreconnait | Hreconnait].
- left. apply union_s0d with (pl:=pl); auto.
- right. apply union_s1d with (pl:=pl); auto.
Qed.
